Entries.DialogueText: Aw yeah, that's the good stuff... Thanks for the birthday gift, .
What the...? Uh, I dunno what it's like where you grew up, but to me, this is trash.
Now that's what I call an egg! Imagine the size of the omelet...
Whoaa... It's so heavy I could use it for bicep curls. I'll be slurping on this for a week! Hah hah!
Oh... um... I usually like eggs, but this one looks evil.
*crunch*... Mmm... Nuts. That hits the spot. Thanks, !
Mmm... Duck egg... Rich and creamy. *crack*... *slurp*. Ahhhh...
Hehe... Keep giving me these every day, and I'll be able to retire at thirty!
Aw, yeah... I've been looking for this one. It's supposed to be full of tips for bulking up. Rule number one... Eat a ton of eggs! Hah, no problem! Thanks!
Whoa... this is great. Thanks!
Umm... I know I'm pretty big on eggs... But this isn't what I meant...
Oh well... Down the hatch! *gulp*
Can you eat this?
I guess there's only one way to find out...
Uhhh... Reading? Yeah, um... I guess I can give it a try.
0.8*crack*... *sluuurp*... Mmmm. Now that's what I call a snack.
You're giving me wha...?
*huff*... Got it. Alright... well, you've made your choice. You're not gonna see me begging.
Have you been up by the lake recently? I was on a run late last night, and I noticed that the old bridge was repaired...
gives your arm a squeeze, grinning.
Well, this is a I'll never forget!
I thought we had something special... I guess I was wrong.
You're not worth my time.
Of course you do. If you didn't I'd think you were crazy. Or some kind of nerd.
Really? You must be some kind of weirdo.
Sorry.
No, I'm not! You're just trying to flatter me.
Yeah, I guess you're right...
You were supposed to disagree with me.
Yes... I know. That's why I've been so determined to be successful with my sports stuff...
Make it or not... As long as I try my hardest I think she'd be proud. Thanks.
Wow... It's the anniversary of my Mom's death! Have a heart...
...Thanks, .
You... you're different than the other guys. More sensitive.
You've become my best friend in the whole town...
I'm glad.
Is that embarrassing to say?
That doesn't make me feel any better, jerk.
That's an interesting thought...
They would never do that!
...Maybe you're right... I dunno.
Uh... I'm not used to opening up like that...
Hey... uh... ? I... feel a lot more 'at peace' after talking to you on the beach last week.
Thanks for listening to me.
Sure, it's getting colder... But it's still warm enough for sports!
That's all I care about.
I'm going to do two hundred sit-ups tonight.
I'm pretty dedicated, aren't I?
Need anything else?
I'm going to do a ton of sit-ups tonight.
You have to work really hard if you want to achieve your maximum potential.
My grandma told me I should spend more time studying.
I was like, '...Grams, don't fret. I'm turning pro!'
Studying is for nerds, anyway.
Maybe she's right...
I think you can find salmon in the river this time of year.
At least that's what I heard.
Hey, the gridball game is on today!
Sundays are pretty awesome in the fall.
What's up?
Isn't your name, like, name, or something?
Oh. It's ? Okay. Sorry.
! Um... Hi.
What's up, ?
Hey, I want to ask you something.
Hey, can I ask you something?
Do you think the ladies like my haircut?
What do you think about my haircut?It looks very fashionable.It looks like some kind of fungal growth.
Yeah, I know. That's why I have it like this.
Yeah right. You're just jealous that I look so good.
I put too much gel in my hair today. It kind of hurts.
Don't touch it!
...what?
I finally took the plunge... I've decided to stop putting gel in my hair.
I wouldn't want to be friends with someone who only liked me because I have gel in my hair.
I saw you checking out the bath house the other day. Trying to get in shape? Heh.
Uh... you didn't go poking around in my locker, did you?
I saw you catch that salmon.
If you happen to make a 'salmon dinner' out of it, let me have a bite!
Heard you caught some kind of rare fish?
I'm impressed. Your arms must be stronger than they look! *pinch* ... not bad!
You beat me to it! I was about to ask you...
I'll see you out there.
Okay, this should be fun... I hope I can remember the moves this year! It's been a while...
Nah... I'm gonna ask someone else. Good luck.
Hey, what's up farmer guy?
Hey, it's farm girl. Did you get new pants? You're doing something right.
Oh, I almost forgot! It's my day for doing push-ups!
Every time I do push-ups I try to do one more than last time. Pretty cool strategy, huh?
Hey, . I'm glad you stopped by.
I'm not ashamed to say that I love my grandma!
Now Grandpa, on the other hand...
Just kidding.
Hi . You look sporty today.
Hey . Did you do something different with your hair? Something keeps grabbing my attention.
What's going on out there? Any action?
I gotta stay here with my grandparents...
I tried to go for a run this morning, but the plants have gone crazy! I couldn't get very far...
Oh, hey. So you're the new guy, huh? Cool.
Hey, you're the new girl, huh? I think we're going to get along great. I'm Alex.
I'll see you around.
You got Haley to marry you, huh? I always figured she was out of your league!
Did you know I was an all-star quarterback in high school? It's true.
See this little star on my jacket here? That proves it.
You know, I used to want fame and fortune, but lately I've been starting to sing a different tune. In the end it's the humble little things that satisfy, don't you think?
I still want to go pro, but it's not the most important thing in the world.
Hey, I overheard someone saying that you got your first chicken the other day.
Man... I wish Grandma had chickens. I'd eat a dozen raw eggs for breakfast each morning!
Ah... The island life. I could get used to this!
I'm ordering a banana shake with two scoops of protein powder.
Aren't you hot in that outfit? C'mon, man... It's the beach!
Aren't you hot in that outfit? You gotta get some ocean breeze goin'!
Finally, we're here!
Aw... I guess it can't last forever.
I wonder how far I could swim out, and still make it back?
I'm guessing at least a mile.
... Don't worry, I'm not going to try it.
With this island open, there's no excuse to be pasty anymore!
Phew, it feels good to finally get these abs a little sunlight.
Kind of a shame to have them hidden away all the time back home.
When I go pro, I'll vacation on islands all around the world.
But for now, this place will do just fine!
I knew I shoulda brought a frisbee... Oh well.
I wonder if anyone would be up for a volleyball tournament.
Don't worry, I'll go easy!
My arms are really sore, but that's the sign of progress for a guy like me.
I must've done a thousand push-ups yesterday.
I've been having a hard time staying focused lately.
I don't know if I can trust you anymore, but I'm willing to give you a chance.
Hey. Summer is definitely the best time of year.
Right now is great because we've got the whole season to look forward to. Catch you later.
What do you want?
I've got more important things to do right now.
Sorry my room is so messy.
It's just hard to always remember to clean. I'm trying to get better, though.
Hey, farmer guy. You look a little burnt.
Hey Farmer girl. You've got a nice tan going.
The more I practice this summer, the easier it'll be for me to go pro.
Then you'd be able to say you knew me once. Cool, huh?
Hey, nice tan.
Mmmm... I smell a barbeque.
Damn I could go for a burger.
I've been trying to do more reading lately... I feel like I've been neglecting my brain for years because of my athletic obsession.
I got these new shoes yesterday 'cuz my old pair had a brown smudge.
I just threw them into the garbage. I would've donated them but I don't like the idea of some weirdo wearing my shoes, ya know?
Oh wow...your shoes are a little dirty... but that's fine, too!
Different people have different tastes I guess.
Hey, you must be getting pretty strong working on that farm all day.
Hey, you must be getting pretty fit working on that farm all day.
Maybe you'll reach my level some day. Something to look forward to, huh?
Why do you have that look on your face?
Hey, you look like you're getting into some good shape this summer!
All that farm work is paying off, huh?
If my hair wasn't so popular with the ladies, I swear I'd shave it all off in a second.
*sigh*... Life can be tough.
Hey farm guy, I've got a question for you.
Hey Farm girl, I've got a question for you.
Do you think I'll ever turn pro?You're destined to be a sports legendMaybe, if you practice a lotNo, you'll most likely fail and become a salesman
Hey, now that's what I'm talking about!
You're cooler than I thought.
Yeah, well I'm so good I'm not going to have to practice all that much.
That's insane. You're just jealous that I'm talented and popular and you're not.
That's ridiculous. You're just jealous that I'm way more popular than you'll ever be, freak.
Get away from me.
52#Hey, when I turn pro you can say you were my first "fan". Not bad, huh?|Hey, I've been practicing twice as hard so I can turn pro and prove you wrong. You just wait.
You know, I actually wouldn't mind being a farmer... it seems a lot like playing sports, in a way.
I like being outdoors and doing things with my hands.
Hey.
What, you wanna talk to me? I'm busy.
Hey, .
That's right, I remember your name.
How's your day going?
The air's starting to warm up... I'm feeling pumped.
The beach is a cool place to hang out and soak up some rays.
You gotta spend some time in the sun or else you'll get all pale.
*sigh*... I wish there were more girls in this town, know what I mean?
Hey, do you wanna hang out with me at the beach some time? Do you have a bikini?
Nothing's better than an energetic day at the beach with your friends... right?
Looks like a good day to play catch, huh?
I'd ask you to throw the ball around, but you don't really seem like the sports type.
If you weren't a girl I'd ask you to play catch.I'm fine just watching you from a distance.I want to play catch with you!(angry) What's that supposed to mean?
Really? I guess I underestimated you.
My arm's a little sore, but maybe next time.
Yeah, some people just aren't made for sports.
Uh... never mind.
Go long! ...just kidding. Hahaha.|I just wish I had someone to play catch with...
Winter is kind of lame. There's too much snow to do anything fun.
I guess some people like it.
You came all the way through the snow to see me?
I guess that makes sense.
That's nice of you.
You like the snow? Me... I'm just looking forward to spring.
There's some weird people living in this town.
...like that guy Sebastian. Why does he wear black all the time?
I don't get it.
I guess it's interesting that some people are totally different than us, you know?
I don't always understand why others act the way they do, but that's fine.
This might be my favorite day of the week.
When I turn pro, I'll be so rich that I'll get a vacation home in the tropics.
Then I won't have to deal with these boring winters.
If I ever make a lot of money, I'll make sure all my friends and family are taken care of.
That means you, too.
I wish I could control the weather.
Hey, can you go find Haley and tell her I said 'hi'?
Oh, hey. How's the married life coming along?
Hey, . Could you do me a favor?
If you see Haley, tell her I'm busy.
Thanks.
I'll admit... I was a little jealous when you and Haley got married. But, hey... It's a chance for me to learn something new about myself.
People stay indoors a lot during the winter, and do boring stuff.
Maybe if I read a book I'd be less bored... nah.
You know what? I'm going to start reading a book!
, this is the greatest thing that could have happened.
I can't wait.
I'm going to love being a farmer.
Oh, hi.
Um, it's , right?
I'm just enjoying this great weather, .
Hmm...
Hey, go long!
Heh... Nice try.
I'm going to be the first professional gridball player from Stardew Valley... There's no doubt in my mind.
I already led my school's team to the regional playoffs... Now I'm just training and getting stronger so I can claim my spot on the roster of the Zuzu City Tunnelers. You just wait!
Thanks, . I'll remember that.
Wow, you're really arrogant.
Hey, that was fun, huh?
*sniff*...
Oh... . You saw me crying.
It was today, twelve years ago... that my Mom died.
I still remember her well... she'd make salted radish sandwiches for lunch... and toss the gridball with me in the back yard.
She took good care of me... and I was too young to really say 'thanks'. Now she's gone forever.
This is the only keepsake I have left... her secret music box.
-1 null -1 0 event_box1 -1 0 event_box2 -1 0 event_box3 -1 0 event_box4#Get over it. Life is hard for everyone.
Well, there's no sense sitting around sniveling... let's head back to town.
Don't tell anyone I was crying. Okay?
Hey!
Hmmph... I think someone's a little jealous.
I'm out of here.
Goal!
Hey, . Before you head out...
I hate to ask this... but can I have 5,000g?
It's for a secret project I'm working on... I know we have a joint bank account, but I thought I should ask anyway.
Really? You won't spare a measly 5,000g to make me happy?
I didn't know you were such a cheapskate...
I just wanted to have a little fun...
Give Alex 5,000g for his secret project?No
I don't want to talk to you right now...
Great! Swing by the Saloon on Sunday and I'll show you the end result!
*sigh*
Oh, Hi .
Look at all these books. I haven't read a single one. Just the thought of cracking one open makes me nervous.
But you can't make a decent living in this world without a brain...
57 null 57 0 Event_books1 57 50 Event_books2 57 -50 Event_books3#Worthless? Yeah, that about sums it up.
Well, I'm not going to give up!
If I work hard, I can do anything!
Hey, maybe one day soon we'll have dinner and discuss ....phi-lo-so-phy. Isn't that what you smart people talk about?
Oh! Hey... I was just doing my daily strength training routine.
... sorry I have no shirt on.
Uh... ? I've been meaning to talk to you about something...
I've started to realize that... well, that I've been really rude towards you in the past. You know, about going pro and all that.
I guess I might not actually be cut out for professional sports... maybe it was just a childish dream... you know?
Anyway... I want to apologize to you for bragging and being annoying about it. I appreciate that you stayed friends with me through all that.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/k 195099
Entries.DialogueText: ? I thought... I thought we were 'one of a kind'... But you were just using me?

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/k 195099_1
Entries.DialogueText: What are you looking at *me* for? You think I'm gonna come to your rescue?

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/k 195099_alt
Entries.DialogueText: Hold it!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/k 195099_alt_1
Entries.DialogueText: That's right!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/k 195099_alt_2
Entries.DialogueText: Sure...
Hey, ! You made it!
So... what do you think?
I've been thinking... You know how I used to dream of being an athlete someday?
Well, my life ended up turning out a bit different...
I'm happy, though, don't get me wrong!
...But I thought it would be cool to have a place where us guys could hang out and watch the Sunday game. Gus liked the idea so much he offered me part of his back room!
This way, I get to keep part of 'the dream' alive, in a small way.
Thanks, Grandpa.
Big play!
There we go!
Thanks, Gus. That was great.
This is nice... I've never dined in here before.
Um, anyway... I reserved this private room so we could talk...
So, what I wanted to say was...
*gulp*
Well... when we first met, I was instantly drawn to you. It was confusing... I'd never felt that way about anyone.
When I first met you, I thought you were really cute.
I kept telling myself 'You can't have these kinds of feelings for another guy'.
Normally, when I have a crush on someone, the feeling goes away pretty quick...
...But my heart was telling me something else.
...But with you, it kept growing.
I can't believe it took this long to say that to each other.
Mmm... this steak is outstanding. Can you smell that fragrant sauce?
I'm sorry... I don't feel that way about you.
Yeah, right!
I'll assume this is just another act...
Typical...
I...I'm sorry if I made you uncomfortable...
I'm not hungry anymore...
That's a good boy, Dusty.
You might be the only one around here who understands me.
No one else has seen the kind of stuff you and I have.
! Did you overhear me talking?
I don't really like to talk about it, but I guess I'll explain...
Have you ever wondered why I live with my grandparents?
You see, my father wasn't a good guy... He... Well, he ruined everything for me and my mom.
Half the time he was gone... The other half he'd drink all night and tell me I'm worthless, that I'd never amount to anything.
I think he resented me for being young... Bitter because he'd wasted his youth doing nothing and had gotten nowhere in life.
Well... that's my take on it, anyway. Who knows what was going on in his mind.
One day he left, and soon after that Mom got sick and passed away. I had no choice but to move in with my grandparents.
You seem like someone I can trust... That's why I'm telling you this, . I don't want any sympathy.
If there's one good thing about my past, it's that it made me strong.
Now... let me show you what Dusty will do for a barbecued steak.
Ha! Look at him slobbering. I think he might like steak as much as I do.
Not really... why?
Oh... I was talking to Dusty.
He and I have a lot in common, actually.
I don't usually like to talk about it... But we've been friends for a while now and I think I can trust you.
My father wasn't a good guy... He... Well he ruined everything for me and my mom.
You know what? There's no sense dwelling on this stuff... I don't want any sympathy from anyone.
You have to look on the positive side of things... My childhood wasn't great, but it did make me strong. I had to be.
Here, let me show you what Dusty will do for a barbecued steak.
Uh.. What are you doing?
Hey, so I picked up {1} {2} at the store last night. Grandma made her special casserole...
I've finally discovered who I want to be... and I feel certain about the future."/pause 500/speak Alex "I don't think I would've gotten here without you, ."
I'm just catching up with some old friends... you go on and have a good time.
I played the 'Strength' game too many times and now my arms feel like rubber.
Did you eat yet? There's almost too much to go around!I already ate three sandwiches... Mmm... that sauce...
Every hundred rounds of the strength game I win, I eat another BBQ sandwich.
There's something weird over there. But how do I get to it?There's gotta be a secret passage somewhere around here.
Hey, you made it past the creepy hands.I think I hear someone calling for help nearby.
I think I heard a girl screaming... She needs my help!
Ungh... I think I ate a dozen too many hard boiled eggs...
I try to eat at least three eggs every day.I need that protein for my legs.
I wonder what would happen to my arms and legs if I ate thirty eggs a day?
I'm just enjoying the scenery... hehe.
Hey, I'm feeling pretty good about today. We'll do great during the ceremony... just follow my lead.
The key to dancing is to have confidence.
Hey, I'll take any excuse to come hang out at the beach. This weather is amazing!
Perfect weather for a beach party, huh?
Today... I eat as much as I want. I'll do extra push-ups tomorrow!
Do you think if I went in the water, other people would follow? I don't want to be a solo swimmer!
I can't believe summer's over... I feel like it just started.
I'm just spending some time with the family for a moment. I'll meet you on the docks soon, okay?
It's a shame that summer has to be over, but I guess that's life...
What am I thankful for? I'll show you when we get back home...
Oh, hello.
Let me know if you get cold. I'll lend you my jacket.
I'm pretty sure there's a gridball-shaped present with my name on it underneath the spirit tree.
I'll be rooting for you in the fishing competition.
Snowmen are okay, I guess. But mostly I'm looking forward to the spring.
Hey! You're going to win by a longshot today, I know it. Make us proud!
You think anyone would mind if I took a dip in the frozen lake after the festival?I've heard ice baths are good for the muscles.
Hey, awesome! I love this stuff!
This is cool! Thanks.
Um... Okay. Thanks.
Are you serious? This is garbage.
Thanks!
